This practical presentation offers implementable guidance for deploying production-grade Kubernetes clusters on Ubuntu. The session addresses critical infrastructure decisions and provides actionable insights you can implement immediately.

## Key Topics

- Container networking interfaces (CNI) selection and configuration
- Persistent storage solutions for production workloads
- Security hardening aligned with CIS benchmarks
- Runtime monitoring via eBPF technology
- Vulnerability assessment automation
- AppArmor container security implementation
- Resource optimization strategies
- Scalable observability from small to multi-region deployments

## What You'll Get

- Downloadable checklist covering networking, storage configuration, and access control
- kubectl commands, YAML configurations, and automation scripts for Ubuntu environments
- Disaster recovery procedures and security scanning tools
- Common pitfalls to avoid in production Kubernetes deployments
